cache.coldboot-query: SELECT alloc_target_master_id, run_order, start_date, end_date, final_signoff_by, final_signoff_time, at_port_code, modified_by, modified_time, status, alloc_target_name, alloc_target_strategy_id, super_id FROM targetdb.dbo.alloc_target_master
